Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller.timing

Class InitGameTimingState

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.timing.TimingState
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.timing.InitGameTimingState
public class InitGameTimingState extends TimingState
The InitGameTimingState class represents the initial state in the timing state machine. This state is triggered when the game is in the GameState.INIT state.
Author:
Tommaso Trabacchin, Melanie Tonarelli, Emanuele Valsecchi, Adem Shehi
